title: Ticket #3547: Lark - Reuse mac addresses
description:
Currently, we generate a new random mac address per job. This will quickly exhaust the ARP cache for switches and cause connectivity issues.

We should generate a mac address once per slot and reuse that if a specific mac was not already requested.
